title: HOUR 1 - Aaron Rodgers Future in Green Bay
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Aaron Rodgers Future in Green Bay
description:
Colin Cowherd opens up the show with a discussion about Packers QB Aaron Rodgers and how he wants to control his current situation with the organization without a trade clause. Lakers PG Russell Westbrook winning the MVP Award in 2016-2017 was just stats without merit. Plus, Ravens' QB Lamar Jackson is further proof of why Colin prefers pocket quarterbacks who can escape!

Guest: Raiders DT Gerald McCoy

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
